entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
